name: get_material_by_char
description: Fetch a material id and formula by a characteristic of the material

params.name: band_gap
params.description: Min,max range of band gap in eV (e.g., [1.2, 3.0]). Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: crystal_system
params.description: Crystal system of material. Available options are 'Triclinic', 'Monoclinic', 'Orthorhombic', 'Tetragonal', 'Trigonal', 'Hexagonal' or 'Cubic'.

params.name: density
params.description: Min,max density range. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: e_electronic
params.description: Min,max electronic dielectric constant. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: e_ionic
params.description: Min,max ionic dielectric constant. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: e_total
params.description: Min,max total dielectric constant. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: efermi
params.description: Min,max fermi energy in eV. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: elastic_anisotropy
params.description: Min,max elastic anisotropy. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: elements
params.description: List of elements (e.g., ['Li', 'Fe', 'O']).

params.name: energy_above_hull
params.description: Min,max energy above hull in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: equilibrium_reaction_energy
params.description: Min,max equilibrium reaction energy in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: formation_energy
params.description: Min,max formation energy in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: g_reuss
params.description: Min,max Reuss grain boundary energy in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: g_voigt
params.description: Min,max Voigt grain boundary energy in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: g_vrh
params.description: Min,max Voigt-Reuss-Hill grain boundary energy in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: k_reuss
params.description: Min,max Reuss bulk modulus in GPa. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: k_voigt
params.description: Min,max Voigt bulk modulus in GPa. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: k_vrh
params.description: Min,max Voigt-Reuss-Hill bulk modulus in GPa. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: n
params.description: Min,max number of atoms. Tuple of ints, and both values are required.

params.name: nelements
params.description: Min,max number of elements. Tuple of ints, and both values are required.

params.name: num_sites
params.description: Min,max number of sites. Tuple of ints, and both values are required.

params.name: num_magnetic_sites
params.description: Min,max number of magnetic sites.

params.name: num_unique_magnetic_sites
params.description: Min,max number of unique magnetic sites. Tuple of ints, and both values are required.

params.name: piezoelectric_modulus
params.description: Min,max piezoelectric modulus in C/m^2. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: poisson_ratio
params.description: Min,max Poisson's ratio. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: shape_factor
params.description: Min,max shape factor. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: surface_energy_anisotropy
params.description: Min,max surface energy anisotropy. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: total_energy
params.description: Min,max total energy in eV/atom.

params.name: total_magnetization
params.description: Min,max total magnetization in Bohr magnetons/atom.

params.name: total_magnetization_normalized_formula_units
params.description: Min,max total magnetization normalized to formula units in Bohr magnetons/formula unit.

params.name: total_magnetization_normalized_vol
params.description: Min,max total magnetization normalized to volume in Bohr magnetons/bohr^3.

params.name: uncorrected_energy
params.description: Min,max uncorrected energy in eV/atom. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: volume
params.description: Min,max volume in bohr^3. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: weighted_surface_energy
params.description: Min,max weighted surface energy in eV/ang^2. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: weighted_work_function
params.description: Min,max weighted work function in eV. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: surface_anisotropy
params.description: Min,max surface anisotropy. Tuple of floats, and both values are required.

params.name: has_reconstructed
params.description: Whether the entry has reconstructed surfaces.

params.name: is_gap_direct
params.description: Whether the material has a direct band gap.

params.name: is_metal
params.description: Whether the material is considered a metal.

params.name: is_stable
params.description: Whether the material lies on the convex energy hull.

params.name: magnetic_ordering
params.description: Magnetic ordering of material. Available options are 'paramagnetic', 'ferromagnetic', 'antiferromagnetic', and 'ferrimagnetic'.

params.name: spacegroup_number
params.description: Spacegroup number of material.

params.name: spacegroup_symbol
params.description: Spacegroup symbol of material.

params.name: exclude_elements
params.description: Elements to exclude (e.g., Li,Fe,O).

params.name: possible_species
params.description: Possible species of material (e.g., Li,Fe,O).

params.name: has_props
params.description: Calculated properties available (list of HasProps or strings).

params.name: theoretical
params.description: Whether the entry is theoretical (true) or experimental/experimentally observed (false).

params.name: temperature
params.description: Temperature in Kelvin (optional).

params.name: pressure
params.description: Pressure in GPa (optional).

params.name: page
params.description: Page number (default 1).

params.name: per_page
params.description: Items per page (max 10; default 10).
